mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from bm_order
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into bm_order (product_id, user_id, order_code, num, price, postage, addr, post, receiver, phone, comment, create_date, update_date, pay_date, delivery_date, confirm_date, status) values (#{product_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{user_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{order_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{price,jdbcType=REAL}, #{postage,jdbcType=REAL}, #{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{post,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{create_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{update_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{pay_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{delivery_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{confirm_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
